#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;
long long int fastPower(long long ba,long long poer)
{
        long long r=1;
        while (poer>0)
        {
                if (poer%2==1)
                      {
                        r = (r*ba)%MOD;
                      }
                ba = (ba*ba)%MOD;
                poer/=2;
        }
        return r%MOD;
}
long long int fPower(long long base,long long power)
{
        long long result=1;
        while (power>0)
        {
                if (power%2==1)
                      {
                        result = (result*base)%(MOD-1);
                      }
                base = (base*base)%(MOD-1);
                power/=2;
        }
        return result%(MOD-1);
}
int main()
{
    long long int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int k,n;
        cin>>k>>n;
        if(n>3)
        {
            cout<<fastPower(k,fPower(2,n-3))<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            if(n==2 || n==3)
            {
                cout<<k<<endl;
            }
            else
            {
                cout<<1<<endl;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
